interfaces.name: ChangeStatusPayload
ChangeTodoStatusPayload
CreateTodoPayload
Todo
TodosListItem
TodosState

injectables.name: ApiService
TodosEffects

properties.name: changeStatus$
create$
delete$
load$

injectables.name: TodosService

components.name: AppComponent
TodosComponent

propertiesClass.name: todosSearch$

components.templateData: @if (todosSearch$ | async; as todos) { @if (search$ | async) { Search result: {{ todos.length === 0 ? "nothing" : "" }} } }

components.name: TodosListComponent
components.templateData:
@for (todo of todos; track todo.id) {
{{ todo.title }}
}

components.name: TodosSearchComponent
components.templateData: Search or create todo

variables.name: appConfig
variables.defaultValue:
{
  providers: [
    provideZoneChangeDetection({ eventCoalescing: true }),
    provideRouter(routes),
    provideAnimationsAsync(),
    provideStore({ todosState: todosReducer }),
    provideEffects(TodosEffects),
    provideHttpClient(),
    provideStoreDevtools({ maxAge: 25, logOnly: !isDevMode() }),
  ],
}

variables.name: todosActions
todosApiActions
todosReducer

src/app/app.config.ts.name: appConfig
src/app/app.config.ts.defaultValue:
{
  providers: [
    provideZoneChangeDetection({ eventCoalescing: true }),
    provideRouter(routes),
    provideAnimationsAsync(),
    provideStore({ todosState: todosReducer }),
    provideEffects(TodosEffects),
    provideHttpClient(),
    provideStoreDevtools({ maxAge: 25, logOnly: !isDevMode() }),
  ],
}

src/app/features/todos/store/todos.reduc.name: todosReducer

src/app/features/todos/store/todos.actio.name: todosActions
todosApiActions
